Key Match Events: Jordan Poole and Draymond Green had several exchanges during the game, highlighting ongoing tension between the former teammates.
Wizards rookie Carlton "Bub" Carrington was involved in an exchange with Draymond Green, which was interrupted by Jordan Poole.
Stephen Curry hit a deep ball right at the buzzer before halftime, which Draymond Green pointed at Jordan Poole to emphasize.
Post-Match Reflections: Draymond Green credited Jordan Poole for playing a lot better compared to last season, noting that Poole is taking smarter shots.
Green mentioned that Poole is doing a good job of settling in and letting the game come to him.
